Who is the person that always makes you feel understood and accepted?

What is a small act of kindness that you still remember?

If you could tell your younger self something, what would it be?
What smell instantly brings back good memories?
What always makes you feel at home, no matter where you are?
Who has been a constant source of support in your life?
What piece of advice has stayed with you over the years?
Tell me something I did that you didn\'t like but never told me.
Tell me something you really think should change.
What is the question you\'ve never asked me?
Have you ever felt our friendship was one-sided, and if so, when?
Is there something you haven\'t told me that you think I should know?
Have you ever felt hurt by something I said or did, and we never talked about it?
Is there a part of your life that you think I don\'t understand or recognize?
Is there any belief or value I hold that you completely disagree with but haven\'t mentioned?
Have you ever felt judged by me, and if so, about what?
Is there a moment when you felt I wasn\'t there for you when you needed me most?
Do you feel there is a part of you that you can\'t express around me?
Have you ever felt envious or resentful towards me, and why?
Is there something in our relationship that you fear losing?
Is there something you\'ve done for me that you feel I haven\'t appreciated enough?
Have you ever been afraid to be completely honest with me? Why?
Is there something you wish you had done differently in our friendship?
Have you ever felt excluded from a plan I made?
Is there an opinion or advice I\'ve given that secretly bothered you?
Have I ever asked you for something that made you feel uncomfortable or pressured?
Have you ever felt belittled by something I said or did?
Is there an expectation you think I have of you that weighs on you?
Is there something you\'d like to tell me but fear it might change our relationship?
Have you ever felt I made a decision that affected our friendship without consulting you?
Is there a promise you feel I haven\'t kept in our relationship?
Is there an aspect of your life you\'d like to share more with me but feel uncomfortable doing so?
Have you ever felt I took our friendship for granted?
Is there a misunderstanding that we haven\'t resolved yet?
Would you like us to be more honest with each other, even if it means having difficult conversations?
Have you ever felt I avoided talking about something important to you?
Is there an attitude or behavior of mine that has disappointed you?
Have you ever doubted the sincerity of my intentions or words?
Do you feel there is an emotional distance between us that we haven\'t addressed?
Would you like there to be more transparency or vulnerability in our friendship?
Have you ever felt I didn\'t listen to what you really wanted to tell me?
Is there something from your past that you think I should know but never told me?
Have you ever felt underestimated in our relationship?
Is there a situation where you wish I had defended you and I didn\'t?
Have you ever felt uncomfortable sharing your problems with me?
Is there an occasion when you felt I didn\'t value your feelings?
Is there something you think I am unable to accept about you?
Have you ever felt ignored or overlooked in our relationship?
Would you like us to spend more time together or connect in a different way?
Have I ever broken your trust without knowing it?
Have you ever felt emotionally distant from me and didn\'t tell me?
Is there a characteristic of mine that you find difficult to handle or understand?
Is there a piece of advice I gave you that you wish I hadn\'t?
Have you ever felt overwhelmed by my problems or situations?
Is there something you think I haven\'t asked you but you wish I would?
Have you ever felt you were competing with me for something?
Is there an aspect of our relationship that you would like to improve or change?
Have you ever felt uncomfortable sharing your achievements with me?
If you could change one thing about our relationship, what would it be?
What do you think is the most important thing I have learned from you?
What do you think would improve our communication?
What do you think is the biggest difference between our personalities?
Would you like us to share more about our future plans?
Do you feel our friendship has evolved or changed over time? How?
What do you think is what binds us together as friends the most?
If you had to describe our friendship in one word, what would it be?
Have you ever felt I disrespected you by how I behaved in public?
What is something you would like us to do more together that we haven\'t done yet?
What has been the biggest challenge we have overcome together in our friendship?
What do you think we could learn from each other if we opened up more?
What is something you\'ve always wondered about me but never dared to ask?
If you had to describe a moment when you felt especially close to me, what would it be?
Is there an aspect of my life that you feel I don\'t share enough with you?
Would you like us to do more activities outside our comfort zone?
Have you ever felt I put other friends above you?

Is there something you think I don\'t appreciate enough about you?
What do you think has been the biggest misunderstanding between us so far?

What do you think we could learn if we had a deeper conversation about our differences?

Is there a topic we never talk about that you\'d like to discuss?
Have you ever felt uncomfortable asking me for help?

What do you think is what most differentiates our friendship from others you have?
Have I ever disappointed you without knowing it? How?
Have you ever had doubts about our friendship? What caused them?

Is there a conversation you would like to revisit because you feel it wasn\'t resolved?

Envía un mensaje a un amigo con quien no hablas hace tiempo. Pregúntale cómo está o invítale un café.
Organiza un desayuno con alguien para esta semana.
Organiza para juntarte a comer con un familiar.
Invita a alguien a caminar o tomar un café.
Comparte una canción que te guste con un amigo.
Pregunta a un amigo qué libro o serie te recomendaría.
Haz una lista de personas con las que te gustaría reconectar. Escríbele a una.
Investiga sobre algo que te haya preguntado un amigo y envíale lo que encontraste.
Comparte algo positivo en tus redes sociales. (Puede ser por privado).
Envía un mensaje de gratitud a alguien que haya tenido un impacto en tu vida. (Puede ser una foto y sticker también).
Organiza un rincón de tu casa.
Compra ese artículo que siempre olvidas.
Haz una lista de pendientes pequeños y resuelve al menos uno.
Prepara tu desayuno favorito para mañana.
Anota una idea o proyecto que siempre tengas en mente.
Escribe un objetivo pequeño para esta semana.
Limpia la bandeja de entrada de tu correo electrónico.
Haz algo que llevas posponiendo desde hace días.
Ponte ropa que hace mucho no utilizas.
Planifica tu día de mañana en 5 minutos.
Mira un tutorial introductorio de algo que te gustaría aprender.
Escribe sobre un tema que te interese, aunque sea solo para vos.
Lee 3 páginas de un libro.
Aprende una palabra nueva en otro idioma.
Escucha un podcast corto.
Dibuja algo, como una flor o una figura geométrica.
Investiga sobre un tema curioso que siempre te ha intrigado.
Dedica 10 minutos a aprender algo relacionado con tu trabajo o estudios.
Descubre un canal de YouTube educativo y mira un video.
Aprende una receta sencilla y prepárala.
Guárdate una lista de reproducción sobre algo que te gustaría aprender.
Escucha una canción que te levante el ánimo.
Dedica 5 minutos a estirar tus músculos.
Date una ducha relajante escuchando música tranquila.
Desconéctate del celular por 30 minutos.
Piensa en 3 cosas por las que te sientas agradecido hoy.
Da un paseo corto al aire libre.
Tómate 10 minutos para tomar una bebida que disfrutes (té, café, jugo).
Ordena algo de tu habitación antes de acostarte.
Medita 5 minutos.
Ve a dormir 30 minutos antes de lo habitual.
